CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Party__r.Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), AND(Party__r.Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'Individual', ISPICKVAL(Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), Employment_Information__c != NULL)), NOT(Accountant_ABN_Status__c == 'Active'), FALSE)
CustomField.label: Accountant ABN Status Warning Check
